name: Golden Radiance Set
about: What it is:A set of essentials for cleansing and revitalizing skin..Skin Type:Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Amino Acids: Recharge skin’s energy source for smoother, plumper-looking skin..What Else You Need to Know:The Precious Gold Vitality Mask contains high-quality 24k gold infusion, gardenia extract, and resveratrol, known antioxidants that visibly counteract the various signs of aging that accumulate in the skin due to mental and physical fatigue..This Set Contains:- 2.7 oz/ 75 mL Precious Gold Vitality Mask
ingredients: -Amino Acids: Recharge skin’s energy source for smoother, plumper-looking skin..-Skin-Empowering Illuminator: Enhances skin’s ability to defend itself against different types of stress..-Gardenia Extract: Visibly counteracts the various signs of aging...Precious Gold Vitality Mask: how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Begin your beauty routine with the antioxidant-rich Softening Cleansing Foam and apply the Precious Gold Vitality Mask with the golden brush to the face. .-Leave on for five to 20 minutes. Rinse.​.-Next, apply Le Serum (sold separately) to activate your skincare, and the softener of your choice using a Clé de Peau Beauté cotton sheet (sold separately).​.-Finish your routine by applying the Intensive Fortifying Emulsion at night to face, neck, and décolleté.
